channel.title: Whonix Gateway Startup Problem
channel.description:
Im having a problems with the gateway on start up it says:
/dev/sda1: UNEXPECTED INCONSISTENCY; RUN fsck MANUALLY (i.e. , without -a or -p options fsck exited with status code 4 done. Failure: file system check of the root filesystem failed The root on the filesystem on /dev/sda1 requires a manual fsck
Any help on how to get the gateway working again would be appreciated

item.title: Whonix Gateway Startup Problem
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Hard: Fix it as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian.

Easier: Get a new Whonix-Gateway.

Background: Perhaps either a software or hardware issue with your physical hdd.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Gateway Startup Problem
item.dc:creator: whonix_12
item.description:
Im having a problems with the gateway on start up it says:

/dev/sda1: UNEXPECTED INCONSISTENCY; RUN fsck MANUALLY
(i.e. , without -a or -p options
fsck exited with status code 4
done.
Failure: file system check of the root filesystem failed
The root on the filesystem on /dev/sda1 requires a manual fsck

Any help on how to get the gateway working again would be appreciated

Read full topic
